description: Change of use of the first, second, third levels and part of gallery floor level from 2 x residential units (Use Class C3) and 3 x live / work units (sui generis use) to use as office (Use Class B1a); removal of existing residential internal partitions, services, suspended ceilings and partial removal of gallery floor level; minor partitioning to create meeting rooms and provision of WC and kitchenette facilities at first, second and third floor level; refurbishment of access door to Curtain Road and internal staircase; refurbishment of existing roof and replacement of rooflights; elevational alterations, including removal of signage, facade, windows, mullions and cills plus structural remedial works to floor joists and structure on first, second and third floors
